metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25314 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, there is an integer overflow in copyString.

notes.Note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) leosilva> xenial and trusty are not affected as code is not present. rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include copyString method, so it is not affected.

criterions.comment: ayttm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cableswig package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
insighttoolkit package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
vnc4 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
